resources.string: This mode follows the traditional Wordle format where players have attempts depending on difficulty to guess the hidden word correctly. Each correct guess reveals the position of the letters in the word with color-coding.
In this mode, players can keep guessing words continuously until they do not succeed. Score is accumulated with each correct guess, and there\'s no limit to the number of words you can guess.

Similar to Classic Wordle, but without color-highlighted letters. Instead, players receive feedback in the form of the number of letters guessed correctly and the number of those letters correctly positioned.
Players have six rows to guess the word, similar to the Classic setup. This mode provides a balanced challenge suitable for most players.
With only five rows available for guessing, Hard mode increases the challenge by reducing the number of attempts. Players need to be more strategic and accurate with their guesses to succeed.
Extreme mode offers the toughest challenge with only four rows for guessing. It demands precision and careful deduction as players have fewer attempts to decipher the hidden word.
